TextBlock.Text: TROV: Hey, what should our next project be? I mean, we finished the basic structure of the colony;
TROV: We have houses, agriculture, and a crude mining site, though it doesn't pull out much.
OYVAR: Ah yes, that's it! We could go to that moon above us and mine there! Chances are, it has lots of metal.
TROV: Good thinking as always, Oyvar! Let's get started.
